Andy Coulson has withstood months of strain over allegations-- which he denies-- that while editor at the News of the World he encouraged reporters to hack the cellphone messages of royals, politicIan Edmondsons and celebrities. Unfortunately, continued coverage of events connected to my old job at the News of the World has made it difficult for me to give the 110 percent needed in this role, Andy Coulson said in a statement confirming his resignation.`` I stand by what I've said about those events but when the spokesman needs a spokesman, it's time to move on.''

Allen Iverson had 32 points and 12 assists Wednesday night, and the Nuggets used a late run to beat the Grizzlies 106-102. This was a big win for us at somebody else's home, Allen Iverson said.`` Down seven points with 3 minutes to go. It was a gut check for us.
